channel.title: system on Morgoth
channel.description: Recent content in system on Morgoth

item.title: GSL_system
item.description: os 提供了操作系统的不依赖平台的接口 import "os" constants # flag 参数 const ( O_RDONLY int = syscall.O_RDONLY O_WRONLY int = syscall.O_WRONLY O_RDWR int = syscall.O_RDWR O_CREATE int = syscall.O_CREATE # 不存在就创建 O_APPEND int = syscall.O_APPEND # 追加写入 O_TRUNC int = syscall.O_TRUNC # 打开时清空文件

item.title: PSL_System
item.description: Generic Operating System Services os import os os.path # 参考PSL_File os.name os.curdir os.pardir # 表示上一级路径.., 需要用abspath解析 # os.path.abspath(os.path.join(os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__)), os.pardir)) os.sep os.extsep os.altsep os.pathsep os.linesep os.defpath os.devnull classes: functions: WCOREDUMP(...) ... abort(...) fork() # 创建一个子进程，
